   \begin{subfigure}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
      \[\begin{tikzcd}[cramped,column sep=scriptsize]
	 {} \\
	& \circ && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet
	\arrow[shorten <=16pt, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=2-6, to=2-8]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-8, to=4-8]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=4-2, to=4-4]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-2, to=6-2]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-2, to=6-4]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=4-4, to=4-6]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-4, to=6-4]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-4, to=6-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=4-6, to=4-8]
	\arrow["a"', from=4-6, to=6-6]
	\arrow["{a_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-6, to=6-8]
	\arrow["a"{description}, from=4-8, to=6-8]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", from=6-2, to=6-4]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-2, to=8-2]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-2, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", from=6-4, to=6-6]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-4, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-4, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=6-6, to=6-8]
	\arrow["b"', from=6-6, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-6, to=8-8]
	\arrow["b", from=6-8, to=8-8]
	\arrow["{\texttt{first}}"{description}, from=8-2, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=8-4, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", from=8-6, to=8-8]
      \end{tikzcd}\]
      \caption{Left merge with $\tau$ communications}
   \end{subfigure}
   \hfill
   \begin{subfigure}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
      \[\begin{tikzcd}[cramped,column sep=scriptsize]
	 {} \\
	& \circ && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet \\
	\\
	& \bullet && \bullet && \bullet && \bullet
	\arrow[shorten <=16pt, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-4, to=2-6]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=2-6, to=2-8]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow["\tau"', from=2-8, to=4-8]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-2, to=4-4]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-2, to=6-2]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-2, to=6-4]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-4, to=4-6]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-4, to=6-4]
	\arrow["{a_{\mathtt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-4, to=6-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-6, to=4-8]
	\arrow["a"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-6, to=6-6]
	\arrow["{a_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=4-6, to=6-8]
	\arrow["a"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=4-8, to=6-8]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{first}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-2, to=6-4]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-2, to=8-2]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{first}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-2, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{\mathtt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-4, to=6-6]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-4, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-4, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-6, to=6-8]
	\arrow["b"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-6, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{b_{\texttt{next}}}"', color={rgb,255:red,44;green,44;blue,175}, from=6-6, to=8-8]
	\arrow["b", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=6-8, to=8-8]
	\arrow["{\texttt{first}}"{description}, color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-2, to=8-4]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-4, to=8-6]
	\arrow["{\texttt{next}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=8-6, to=8-8]
      \end{tikzcd}\]
      \caption{Restriction of $H_{1}$ with $\tau$ actions}
   \end{subfigure}
   \caption{Example of Triggering operator with internal actions}
